4. Grid-based Numerical methods … in a parallel distributed computing environment
Do all that stuff from earlier…..
But now the grid is broken into pieces in different processes, which may not share memory!
4. Grid-based Numerical methods … in a parallel distributed computing environment
Do all that stuff from earlier…..
But now the grid is broken into pieces in different processes, which may not share memory!
Need an algorithm to break up the grid efficiently
4. Grid-based Numerical methods … in a parallel distributed computing environment
4. Grid-based Numerical methods … in a parallel distributed computing environment
Do all that stuff from earlier…..
But now the grid is broken into pieces in different processes, which may not share memory!
Need an algorithm to break up the grid efficiently
Need to copy points from adjacent regions to take derivatives at grid edges\u2028(ghost zones)
Need to communicate and sync these ghost-zone points between processes
